content.query:
USE [serverless]
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand] 
WITH IDENTITY='Managed Identity' 

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [delimitedtext_pipe_firstrow1] WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, FORMAT_OPTIONS (FIELD_TERMINATOR = N'|', USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False))
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [delimitedtext_pipe_firstrow2] WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, FORMAT_OPTIONS (FIELD_TERMINATOR = N'|', First_Row = 2, USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False))
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [delimitedtext_pipe_firstrow6] WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, FORMAT_OPTIONS (FIELD_TERMINATOR = N'|', First_Row = 6, USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False))
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [parquet_snappy] WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET, DATA_COMPRESSION = N'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec')
GO

GO
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [Configurations]  WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsereno.dfs.core.windows.net/filesystem/Configurations', 
    CREDENTIAL = sqlondemand 
);

GO
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [Metadata]  WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsereno.dfs.core.windows.net/filesystem/Metadata', 
    CREDENTIAL = sqlondemand 
);

GO
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [Clients]  WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsereno.dfs.core.windows.net/filesystem/Raw/Clients', 
    CREDENTIAL = sqlondemand 
);

GO
CREATE USER [ABC] FROM LOGIN [ABC@grics.ca];

alter role db_owner Add member [ABC]
